@studiocms/dashboard:index.title: Dashboard
@studiocms/dashboard:index.sub-header: StudioCMS is a free and open-source content management system built from the ground up by the Astro community.

@studiocms/dashboard:sidebar.category-3-empty-placeholder: No plugins with settings pages found.

@studiocms/dashboard:profile.title: User Profile
@studiocms/dashboard:profile.user-password-no-password: It looks like your account doesn't have a password set. You can set one by using the form below.
